long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you organize the tasks you need to do in your daily life, distraction and hassle-free. 

This project uses various React.js components, such as states, hooks, and functions to bring you an interactive experience.
